participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, she enjoys deep conversations and values her relationships.
participant_1.background: I don't have enough hours in the day to do all the things I love. i like having my back scratched. my favorite book is the bible. i live in a suburb of boston. i always put my left sock on first.

participant_2.name: Brian
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and caring, he is passionate about teaching and enjoys sharing knowledge with others.
participant_2.background: My favorite possession is the watch my grandfather gave me. i think i have talent for it. my glasses are always dirty and i can t seem to get them clean. I enjoy taking care of animals and using my nice office supplies. i just graduated college with my bachelors degree in education.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
Doing good, just got off work.
Oh, what do you do for work?
That's awesome! How do you like it?
It's great, I love working with kids.
I bet! Do you have any pets?
I have two dogs, a golden retriever and a beagle.
Oh my gosh, that sounds adorable! What are their names?
The golden retriever's name is Buddy and the beagle's name is Bailey.
Those are great names! Do you like to read?
I love to read! My favorite book is The Lord of the Rings.
That's a great book! I love the movies too.
Me too! I'm so excited for the new one coming out.
Me too! I'm not sure if I can wait that long.
Me neither! I'm going to have to watch the movies again to pass the time.
That's a good idea! I'm sure you'll be able to find a way to pass the time until the new movie comes out.
I'm sure I will. I always do.
